Translations.Text: When gxi seg them el afar ili auxd its rage haladz
Kaj when ili jxet gxi narrow met all shackled ili deklar their remorse
Vi ne deklar just single remorse ke tag; vi sufer great numer remorses
Dir Est this put etern Paradise ke promes por des righteous? Gxi est their put ind rekompenc; put ind destiny
Ili get anything ili wish therein forever This est your Lord's irrevocable promes
Tag when Li summons them together idols ili set DI Li hav dir vol vi misled these servants de Min Hav ili ir astray sur their own
Ili dir Vi glor ne est dekstr us set any lords Vi. Vi allowed them gxu together their parents Consequently ili disregarded message tiel igx wicked popol
Ili disbelieved message vi don them consequently vi can nek protekt them el retribution ili incurred nor can vi help them en any voj Anyone among vi commits evil ni commit him severe retribution
Ni ne send any messengers vi ne mangx food marsx merkat! Ni tiel test vi per each ali vi steadfastly persevere Your Lord est Seer
